Pre-Apocalypse[]:
Nothing is known about Delly's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that when she and 
Carla
 were younger, 
Sherry
 and 
Tina
 would often babysit them.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Delly and Carla are found covered in glass, melted from the burned out greenhouse in the forest they died in. Unbeknownst to Tina, she and Carla had reanimated into zombies and were able to attack her, breaking the glass layer on top of them, when she got too close, resulting in her death. One moment later she is put down by Daryl.

(Alive, Accidental)
Delly and Carla were killed as a result of the forest fire set by Dwight in the early stages of the outbreak.
Daryl Dixon
 
(Zombified)
After biting Tina, Daryl puts down a zombified Delly.
